Share Your Art With The World

HiveMind AR empowers independent artists and dealers to showcase their work globally through augmented reality technology. No app required - AR works directly in your browser.

Get Started Free

Create Your Gallery

Subscribe for free and create your profile. Provide some biographical details, and select from three different subscription levels. Upload your artwork images with their descriptions using our intuitive customization interface.

Share Your Work

Share your gallery links with potential buyers worldwide. Visitors can view your art in augmented reality directly in their browser - no app download required.

Sell to Anyone

Viewers can connect with you directly through the messaging portal to inquire about your artwork and negotiate purchases. Sell your art to anyone, anywhere in the world.

How It Works

1

Subscribe

Create your free account and choose a subscription tier based on how many artworks you want to showcase.

2

Upload

Upload your artwork images with dimensions for true-scale AR viewing. Add descriptions, pricing, and details.

3

Share

Share your gallery link or QR code. Buyers view your art in AR at true scale in their own space.

True Scale AR

HVM AR ensures precise image scaling, representing the true size of art unlike many other AR solutions. Buyers see exactly how your artwork will look in their space.

Analytics Dashboard

Gain valuable insights into customer behavior, such as views and engagement, to make informed decisions about inventory and pricing strategies.

Social Sharing

Easily share your virtual galleries across social media platforms to expand your reach and attract new interest in your artwork.
